Quote.Author: Mario Batali
Quote.QuoteValue: I really want to be a rock star

Quote.Author: Mario Batali
Quote.QuoteValue: Look at cookbooks with your kids and ask them what sounds good

Quote.Author: Mario Batali
Quote.QuoteValue: Spaghetti is love

Quote.Author: Mariska Hargitay
Quote.QuoteValue: I have so much love that I didn't even know about

Quote.Author: Mariska Hargitay
Quote.QuoteValue: You make sacrifices to become a mother, but you really find yourself and your soul

Quote.Author: Mariska Hargitay
Quote.QuoteValue: If I eat clean, I look 10 years younger

Quote.Author: Mariska Hargitay
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an L.A. girl who became a tough New York cop

Quote.Author: Mariska Hargitay
Quote.QuoteValue: I was lucky enough to have a father who said, 'Don't quit.' So I just kept going

Quote.Author: Mariska Hargitay
Quote.QuoteValue: My weekends are extremely precious

Quote.Author: Mariska Hargitay
Quote.QuoteValue: I say to everybody, 'Adoption is not for the faint of heart.'

Quote.Author: Mariska Hargitay
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to kick fear to the side, because the payoff is huge

Quote.Author: Mariska Hargitay
Quote.QuoteValue: I realize that you have to show up for your life

Quote.Author: Mariska Hargitay
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a nest egg, and I don't buy above my means

Quote.Author: Marissa Mayer
Quote.QuoteValue: When you need to innovate, you need collaboration

Quote.Author: Marissa Mayer
Quote.QuoteValue: I refuse to be stereotyped

Quote.Author: Marissa Mayer
Quote.QuoteValue: Geeks are people who love something so much that all the details matter

Quote.Author: Marissa Mayer
Quote.QuoteValue: I really love color

Quote.Author: Marissa Mayer
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't feel overwhelmed with information. I really like it

Quote.Author: Marissa Mayer
Quote.QuoteValue: I pace myself by taking a week-long vacation every four months

Quote.Author: Marissa Mayer
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always liked simplicity

Quote.Author: Marissa Mayer
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to stay in the rhythm of things

Quote.Author: Marissa Mayer
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't have everything you want, but you can have the things that really matter to you

Quote.Author: Marissa Mayer
Quote.QuoteValue: It's really wonderful to work in an environment with a lot of smart people

Quote.Author: Marjane Satrapi
Quote.QuoteValue: The first writing of the human being was drawing, not writing

Quote.Author: Marjane Satrapi
Quote.QuoteValue: It's cinematographic to smoke. Imagine Lauren Bacall without a cigarette

Quote.Author: Marjane Satrapi
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think of myself as a rebel; I just say what I think

Quote.Author: Marjane Satrapi
Quote.QuoteValue: A real love story has to finish bad. That is what I think

Quote.Author: Marjane Satrapi
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, drawing is a question of death and life. Every day I draw, I write, I do something

Quote.Author: Marjane Satrapi
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the French for their sarcasm, their irony. I love them for their bad moods

Quote.Author: Marjane Satrapi
Quote.QuoteValue: I am very bad at computers. I don't really know how to write email

Quote.Author: Marjane Satrapi
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to quit smoking. I am convinced that if I quit smoking, the world would go to hell

Quote.Author: Marjane Satrapi
Quote.QuoteValue: All big changes of the world come from words

Quote.Author: Marjane Satrapi
Quote.QuoteValue: I wasn't made to take orders. My grandmother used to tell me: 'Laws are for idiots.' She was right

Quote.Author: Mark Cuban
Quote.QuoteValue: When you've got 10,000 people trying to do the same thing, why would you want to be number 10,001?

Quote.Author: Mark Cuban
Quote.QuoteValue: I think political people are afraid of me

Quote.Author: Mark Cuban
Quote.QuoteValue: I worked hard and smarter than most people in the businesses I have been in

Quote.Author: Mark Cuban
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't care what anyone says. Being rich is a good thing

Quote.Author: Mark Cuban
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that any reporter or columnist will be a little more careful when doing interviews with me

Quote.Author: Mark Cuban
Quote.QuoteValue: Money is a scoreboard where you can rank how you're doing against other people

Quote.Author: Mark Cuban
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learned the number one job of a pro manager is not to win championships but to keep their job

Quote.Author: Mark Cuban
Quote.QuoteValue: I create offbeat advice; I don't follow it. I rarely take third-party advice on my investments

Quote.Author: Mark Cuban
Quote.QuoteValue: Automation is going to cause unemployment, and we need to prepare for it

Quote.Author: Mark Cuban
Quote.QuoteValue: I think one of the biggest curses in the U.S. is that we have only two political parties

Quote.Author: Mark Ruffalo
Quote.QuoteValue: People say funny things all the time during really serious moments in life

Quote.Author: Mark Ruffalo
Quote.QuoteValue: I had to work on a Marlin boat, like gutting fish, like as the bait boy

Quote.Author: Mark Ruffalo
Quote.QuoteValue: My belief about acting in one foot on a banana peel and the other one in the grave

Quote.Author: Mark Ruffalo
Quote.QuoteValue: Also, stick around. Don't lose your heart, just keep going, keep at it

Quote.Author: Mark Ruffalo
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to think the movies that I've picked have something worthwhile to say. Something relevant

Quote.Author: Mark Ruffalo
Quote.QuoteValue: Commercials that are geared towards kids. I think they should just, like, wipe them out

Quote.Author: Mark Ruffalo
Quote.QuoteValue: I became an actor so I didn't have to be myself

Quote.Author: Mark Ruffalo
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to disappear in the parts I play

Quote.Author: Mark Ruffalo
Quote.QuoteValue: I live a bourgeois life

Quote.Author: Mark Ruffalo
Quote.QuoteValue: The problem to me is violence. It's not cool to kill somebody or hurt people

Quote.Author: Mark Wahlberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always wanted to do right in life. But the wanting and the doing aren't quite the same thing

Quote.Author: Mark Wahlberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I can always see something of myself in the characters I play

Quote.Author: Mark Wahlberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I never got on the course with my dad, but to be playing golf with my kids - that's a dream

Quote.Author: Mark Wahlberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I never lie. I believe everything I say, so it's not a lie

Quote.Author: Mark Wahlberg
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of talented actors still have to pay their bills

Quote.Author: Mark Wahlberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Immortality... Is that a super power?

Quote.Author: Mark Wahlberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Tiger Woods is the only sports star who's worth every penny he makes

Quote.Author: Mark Wahlberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I have more money now than I know what to do with

Quote.Author: Mark Wahlberg
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was a rapper, the groupies didn't have to try too hard with me. Just show up at the hotel

Quote.Author: Mark Wahlberg
Quote.QuoteValue: As far as I'm concerned, there's no job more important on the planet than being a mom

Quote.Author: Mark Zuckerberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Our goal is not to build a platform; it's to be cross all of them

Quote.Author: Mark Zuckerberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I wear the same outfit or, at least, a different copy of it almost every day

Quote.Author: Mark Zuckerberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Move fast and break things. Unless you are breaking stuff, you are not moving fast enough

Quote.Author: Mark Zuckerberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Figuring out what the next big trend is tells us what we should focus on

Quote.Author: Mark Zuckerberg
Quote.QuoteValue: By giving people the power to share, we're making the world more transparent

Quote.Author: Mark Zuckerberg
Quote.QuoteValue: People at Facebook are fairly used to the press being nice to us or not nice to us

Quote.Author: Mark Zuckerberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm trying to make the world a more open place

Quote.Author: Mark Zuckerberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I do everything on my phone as a lot of people do

Quote.Author: Mark Zuckerberg
Quote.QuoteValue: We're running the company to serve more people

Quote.Author: Mark Zuckerberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I started the site when I was 19. I didn't know much about business back then

Quote.Author: Marlene Dietrich
Quote.QuoteValue: It's the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter

Quote.Author: Marlene Dietrich
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a gigantic difference between earning a great deal of money and being rich

Quote.Author: Marlene Dietrich
Quote.QuoteValue: Darling, the legs aren't so beautiful, I just know what to do with them

Quote.Author: Marlene Dietrich
Quote.QuoteValue: Most women set out to try to change a man, and when they have changed him they do not like him

Quote.Author: Marlene Dietrich
Quote.QuoteValue: Courage and grace are a formidable mixture. The only place to see it is in the bullring

Quote.Author: Marlene Dietrich
Quote.QuoteValue: Grumbling is the death of love

Quote.Author: Marlene Dietrich
Quote.QuoteValue: Think twice before burdening a friend with a secret

Quote.Author: Marlene Dietrich
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're dead, you're dead. That's it

Quote.Author: Marlene Dietrich
Quote.QuoteValue: The Germans and I no longer speak the same language

Quote.Author: Marlene Dietrich
Quote.QuoteValue: Superstitions are habits rather than beliefs

Quote.Author: Marlon Brando
Quote.QuoteValue: An actor is at most a poet and at least an entertainer

Quote.Author: Marlon Brando
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't mind that I'm fat. You still get the same money

Quote.Author: Marlon Brando
Quote.QuoteValue: Never confuse the size of your paycheck with the size of your talent

Quote.Author: Marlon Brando
Quote.QuoteValue: I have eyes like those of a dead pig

Quote.Author: Marlon Brando
Quote.QuoteValue: If we are not our brother's keeper, at least let us not be his executioner

Quote.Author: Marlon Brando
Quote.QuoteValue: An actor's a guy who, if you ain't talking about him, ain't listening

Quote.Author: Marlon Brando
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing an actor owes his public is not to bore them

Quote.Author: Marlon Brando
Quote.QuoteValue: The only reason I'm in Hollywood is that I don't have the moral courage to refuse the money

Quote.Author: Marlon Brando
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want something from an audience, you give blood to their fantasies. It's the ultimate hustle

Quote.Author: Marlon Brando
Quote.QuoteValue: Privacy is not something that I'm merely entitled to, it's an absolute prerequisite

Quote.Author: Marquis de Sade
Quote.QuoteValue: Your body is the church where Nature asks to be reverenced

Quote.Author: Marquis de Sade
Quote.QuoteValue: All universal moral principles are idle fancies

Quote.Author: Marquis de Sade
Quote.QuoteValue: In order to know virtue, we must first acquaint ourselves with vice

Quote.Author: Marquis de Sade
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not my mode of thought that has caused my misfortunes, but the mode of thought of others

Quote.Author: Marquis de Sade
Quote.QuoteValue: One is never so dangerous when one has no shame, than when one has grown too old to blush

Quote.Author: Marquis de Sade
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is ideal, it is the work of the imagination

Quote.Author: Marquis de Sade
Quote.QuoteValue: The more defects a man may have, the older he is, the less lovable, the more resounding his success

Quote.Author: Marquis de Sade
Quote.QuoteValue: Nature has not got two voices, you know, one of them condemning all day what the other commands

Quote.Author: Marquis de Sade
Quote.QuoteValue: It is always by way of pain one arrives at pleasure

Quote.Author: Marquis de Sade
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth titillates the imagination far less than fiction

Quote.Author: Marshall McLuhan
Quote.QuoteValue: We become what we behold. We shape our tools and then our tools shape us

Quote.Author: Marshall McLuhan
Quote.QuoteValue: We drive into the future using only our rearview mirror

Quote.Author: Marshall McLuhan
Quote.QuoteValue: All media exist to invest our lives with artificial perceptions and arbitrary values

Quote.Author: Marshall McLuhan
Quote.QuoteValue: Canada is the only country in the world that knows how to live without an identity

Quote.Author: Marshall McLuhan
Quote.QuoteValue: A point of view can be a dangerous luxury when substituted for insight and understanding

Quote.Author: Marshall McLuhan
Quote.QuoteValue: I wouldn't have seen it if I hadn't believed it

Quote.Author: Marshall McLuhan
Quote.QuoteValue: The more the data banks record about each one of us, the less we exist

Quote.Author: Marshall McLuhan
Quote.QuoteValue: We shape our tools and afterwards our tools shape us

Quote.Author: Marshall McLuhan
Quote.QuoteValue: There are no passengers on spaceship earth. We are all crew

Quote.Author: Marshall McLuhan
Quote.QuoteValue: Where the whole man is involved there is no work. Work begins with the division of labor

Quote.Author: Marshawn Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: When a defender comes up to tackle me, I want him to feel that ground

Quote.Author: Marshawn Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: I got dogs. I'm a dog guy

Quote.Author: Marshawn Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know what's in store for me. I don't know what tomorrow is going to bring

Quote.Author: Marshawn Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: I ain't got nothing to say. I just wanna play football

Quote.Author: Marshawn Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: My favorite college experience was probably leaving college

Quote.Author: Marshawn Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to go home and get involved in my community

Quote.Author: Marshawn Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: The Seahawks, their front office gets in the media; they talk a lot

Quote.Author: Marshawn Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: What's my favorite thing about Seattle? It's Ho Ho's Restaurant

Quote.Author: Marshawn Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm cool with my body, I love my body. I wouldn't trade it for no other body

Quote.Author: Marshawn Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: Dej Loaf's solid

Quote.Author: Martha Beck
Quote.QuoteValue: Every day brings new choices

Quote.Author: Martha Beck
Quote.QuoteValue: Loneliness is proof that your innate search for connection is intact

Quote.Author: Martha Beck
Quote.QuoteValue: The process of spotting fear and refusing to obey it is the source of all true empowerment

Quote.Author: Martha Beck
Quote.QuoteValue: When you meet people, show real appreciation, then genuine curiosity

Quote.Author: Martha Beck
Quote.QuoteValue: Absolutely lonely people have few personal interactions of any kind

Quote.Author: Martha Beck
Quote.QuoteValue: In fact, when care appears, unconditional love often vanishes

Quote.Author: Martha Beck
Quote.QuoteValue: Not everyone is equally good-looking

Quote.Author: Martha Beck
Quote.QuoteValue: The average adult laughs 15 times a day; the average child, more than 400 times

Quote.Author: Martha Beck
Quote.QuoteValue: Caring for your inner child has a powerful and surprisingly quick result: Do it and the child heals

Quote.Author: Martha Beck
Quote.QuoteValue: Children who assume adult responsibilities feel old when they're young

Quote.Author: Martha Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: Dance is the hidden language of the soul of the body

Quote.Author: Martha Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: Great dancers are not great because of their technique, they are great because of their passion

Quote.Author: Martha Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: Fire is the test of gold; adversity, of strong men

Quote.Author: Martha Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: Every dance is a kind of fever chart, a graph of the heart

Quote.Author: Martha Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: You are unique, and if that is not fulfilled, then something has been lost

Quote.Author: Martha Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: The body says what words cannot

Quote.Author: Martha Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: First we have to believe, and then we believe

Quote.Author: Martha Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: Misery is a communicable disease

Quote.Author: Martha Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: The body never lies

Quote.Author: Martha Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Age' is the acceptance of a term of years. But maturity is the glory of years

Quote.Author: Martha Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: The more you adapt, the more interesting you are

Quote.Author: Martha Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: I love dessert. I can't be guilty about it because I have to taste everything. I experiment

Quote.Author: Martha Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: Without an open-minded mind, you can never be a great success

Quote.Author: Martha Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: My new motto is: When you're through changing, you're through

Quote.Author: Martha Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: I catnap now and then, but I think while I nap, so it's not a waste of time

Quote.Author: Martha Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: If you learn something new every day, you can teach something new every day

Quote.Author: Martha Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: So the pie isn't perfect? Cut it into wedges. Stay in control, and never panic

Quote.Author: Martha Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: All the things I love is what my business is all about

Quote.Author: Martha Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a microphone on one ankle and an ankle bracelet on the other, so I'm well balanced today

Quote.Author: Martha Stewart
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm never sick. Why get sick? It's a waste of time

Quote.Author: Martin Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big believer that life changes as much as you want it to

Quote.Author: Martin Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: My idea of a good night out is staying in

Quote.Author: Martin Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: You absorb 2,000 years of history just by being near the Thames

Quote.Author: Martin Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: I can spot someone with similar fashion sense to me a mile off

Quote.Author: Martin Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: I would wear a full-length cape if I could get away with it - I do love a good swirl in a fog

Quote.Author: Martin Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: People misunderstand me

Quote.Author: Martin Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a very extreme state of mind. Things are very black or very white

Quote.Author: Martin Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not posh or common, I'm in between

Quote.Author: Martin Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always got my eye on my deathbed

Quote.Author: Martin Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got an overly developed sense of what selling out is, and I of course worry about it too much

Quote.Author: Martin Heidegger
Quote.QuoteValue: The most thought-provoking thing in our thought-provoking time is that we are still not thinking

Quote.Author: Martin Heidegger
Quote.QuoteValue: We do not say: Being is, time is, but rather: there is Being and there is time

Quote.Author: Martin Heidegger
Quote.QuoteValue: The possible ranks higher than the actual

Quote.Author: Martin Heidegger
Quote.QuoteValue: Every man is born as many men and dies as a single one

Quote.Author: Martin Heidegger
Quote.QuoteValue: Language is the house of the truth of Being

Quote.Author: Martin Heidegger
Quote.QuoteValue: Making itself intelligible is suicide for philosophy

Quote.Author: Martin Heidegger
Quote.QuoteValue: Why are there beings at all, instead of Nothing?

Quote.Author: Martin Heidegger
Quote.QuoteValue: To dwell is to garden

Quote.Author: Martin Heidegger
Quote.QuoteValue: Man is not the lord of beings. Man is the shepherd of Being

Quote.Author: Martin Heidegger
Quote.QuoteValue: Only a god can save us

Quote.Author: Martin Scorsese
Quote.QuoteValue: Cinema is a matter of what's in the frame and what's out

Quote.Author: Martin Scorsese
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no such thing as simple. Simple is hard

Quote.Author: Martin Scorsese
Quote.QuoteValue: If your mother cooks Italian food, why should you go to a restaurant?

Quote.Author: Martin Scorsese
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm making a film, I'm the audience

Quote.Author: Martin Scorsese
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't make pictures for Oscars

Quote.Author: Martin Scorsese
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm going to be 60, and I'm almost used to myself

Quote.Author: Martin Scorsese
Quote.QuoteValue: I was born in 1942, so I was mainly aware of Howard Hughes' name on RKO Radio Pictures

Quote.Author: Martin Scorsese
Quote.QuoteValue: I do know that some Buddhists are able to attain peace of mind

Quote.Author: Martin Scorsese
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't really envision a time when I'm not shooting something

Quote.Author: Martin Scorsese
Quote.QuoteValue: Eradicating a religion of kindness is, I think, a terrible thing for the Chinese to attempt

Quote.Author: Mary Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: Cooking and baking is both physical and mental therapy

Quote.Author: Mary Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: I think baking is very rewarding, and if you follow a good recipe, you will get success

Quote.Author: Mary Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: It's so comforting to have a small piece of cake. Just one slice

Quote.Author: Mary Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: Family life is fragmenting in this modern age, but it's up to all of us to keep it together

Quote.Author: Mary Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: I was rather hopeless at school, but the one subject I seemed to be good at was domestic science

Quote.Author: Mary Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: The only time I'll use a microwave is to warm up a cup of coffee I've left too long before drinking

Quote.Author: Mary Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: Some of my fondest memories are holidays by the seaside

Quote.Author: Mary Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: I think to eat cake is very good for us, but it's the size of the slice and how often you have it

Quote.Author: Mary Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: Wherever possible, I like to use home-grown or locally produced ingredients

Quote.Author: Mary Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're on the way up, you have to take all the jobs because bills have to be paid

Quote.Author: Mary J. Blige
Quote.QuoteValue: You can look at my palm and see the storm coming. Read the book of my life and see I've overcome it

Quote.Author: Mary J. Blige
Quote.QuoteValue: Believe in yourself when nobody else does

Quote.Author: Mary J. Blige
Quote.QuoteValue: My journey continues, because I've, you know, conquered a lot. And I know how to conquer the rest

Quote.Author: Mary J. Blige
Quote.QuoteValue: It hurts when you have to smile and you don't want to smile, but the best thing to do is to smile

Quote.Author: Mary J. Blige
Quote.QuoteValue: I can have as many bad days as anyone. But I choose to say, 'I'm just fine.'

Quote.Author: Mary J. Blige
Quote.QuoteValue: When you hold on to anger and unforgiveness, you can't move forward

Quote.Author: Mary J. Blige
Quote.QuoteValue: Once you climb to another level, you have to figure out how to sustain it

Quote.Author: Mary J. Blige
Quote.QuoteValue: When life is real, it's not going to be smooth

Quote.Author: Mary J. Blige
Quote.QuoteValue: The music business is not a good place for people who don't know things

Quote.Author: Mary J. Blige
Quote.QuoteValue: There's not enough time to be disrespecting... Life is too short

Quote.Author: Mary Kay Ash
Quote.QuoteValue: No matter how busy you are, you must take time to make the other person feel important

Quote.Author: Mary Kay Ash
Quote.QuoteValue: The speed of the leader is the speed of the gang

Quote.Author: Mary Kay Ash
Quote.QuoteValue: A company is only as good as the people it keeps

Quote.Author: Mary Kay Ash
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone wants to be appreciated, so if you appreciate someone, don't keep it a secret

Quote.Author: Mary Kay Ash
Quote.QuoteValue: Sandwich every bit of criticism between two layers of praise

Quote.Author: Mary Kay Ash
Quote.QuoteValue: Most people live and die with their music still unplayed. They never dare to try

Quote.Author: Mary Kay Ash
Quote.QuoteValue: If you think you can, you can. And if you think you can't, you're right

Quote.Author: Mary Kay Ash
Quote.QuoteValue: Left eyebrow raised, right eyebrow raised

Quote.Author: Mary Kay Ash
Quote.QuoteValue: A good goal is like a strenuous exercise - it makes you stretch

Quote.Author: Mary Kay Ash
Quote.QuoteValue: Every silver lining has a cloud

Quote.Author: Mary McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: We all live in suspense from day to day; in other words, you are the hero of your own story

Quote.Author: Mary McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: Every word she writes is a lie, including and and the

Quote.Author: Mary McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: I am putting real plums into an imaginary cake

Quote.Author: Mary McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: People with bad consciences always fear the judgment of children

Quote.Author: Mary McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: We are the hero of our own story

Quote.Author: Mary McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: Bureaucracy, the rule of no one, has become the modern form of despotism

Quote.Author: Mary McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: Life for the European is a career; for the American it is a hazard

Quote.Author: Mary McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: In science, all facts, no matter how trivial or banal, enjoy democratic equality

Quote.Author: Mary McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: You musn't force sex to do the work of love or love to do the work of sex

Quote.Author: Mary McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: Europe is the unfinished negative of which America is the proof

Quote.Author: Mary Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: Tell me, what is it you plan to do with your one wild and precious life?

Quote.Author: Mary Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: So this is how you swim inward. So this is how you flow outwards. So this is how you pray

Quote.Author: Mary Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather write about polar bears than people

Quote.Author: Mary Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: To pay attention, this is our endless and proper work

Quote.Author: Mary Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: I simply do not distinguish between work and play

Quote.Author: Mary Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: I very much wished not to be noticed, and to be left alone, and I sort of succeeded

Quote.Author: Mary Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: One thing I do know is that poetry, to be understood, must be clear

Quote.Author: Mary Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: People want poetry. They need poetry. They get it. They don't want fancy work

Quote.Author: Mary Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: In college, you learn how to learn. Four years is not too much time to spend at that

Quote.Author: Mary Oliver
Quote.QuoteValue: To find a new word that is accurate and different, you have to be alert for it

Quote.Author: Mary Roach
Quote.QuoteValue: All of my books tend to be about things going on in labs that you wouldn't really expect

Quote.Author: Mary Roach
Quote.QuoteValue: If I couldn't use food or love to define contentment, I would use reading

Quote.Author: Mary Roach
Quote.QuoteValue: Gravitation is the lust of the cosmos

Quote.Author: Mary Roach
Quote.QuoteValue: Day by day, I'm kind of a bore

Quote.Author: Mary Roach
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, death is dark, pain, grief

Quote.Author: Mary Roach
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a science goober

Quote.Author: Mary Roach
Quote.QuoteValue: The Internet is a boon for hypochondriacs like me

Quote.Author: Mary Roach
Quote.QuoteValue: I rarely listen to music while writing. I wish I could, but it distracts me

Quote.Author: Mary Roach
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been writing full-time since about 1984 - mostly magazine features and columns

Quote.Author: Mary Roach
Quote.QuoteValue: Flatulence peaks twice a day... five hours after lunch and five hours after dinner

Quote.Author: Mary Tyler Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't be brave if you've only had wonderful things happen to you

Quote.Author: Mary Tyler Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes you have to get to know someone really well to realize you're really strangers

Quote.Author: Mary Tyler Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not an actress who can create a character. I play me

Quote.Author: Mary Tyler Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Lou Grant was pretty much always Lou Grant

Quote.Author: Mary Tyler Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been independent. I've always had courage. But I didn't always own my diabetes

Quote.Author: Mary Tyler Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Diets are for those who are thick and tired of it

Quote.Author: Mary Tyler Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had the fame and the joy of getting laughter - those are gifts
